CustomField.description: Make Approval Required True for QTC Portfolio
CustomField.formula: AND(Portfolio_from_Quote_Line_Item__c='QTC', OR( NokiaCPQ_Custom_Bid__c , ISBLANK(NokiaCPQ_Floor_Price__c) , ISNULL(NokiaCPQ_Floor_Price__c) , NokiaCPQ_ExtendedPrice_CNP__c < ( NokiaCPQ_Floor_Price__c * Apttus_Config2__ExtendedQuantity__c ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Flag indicating Approval requried for Line item
CustomField.label: Approval Required
